original_text: The third chariot had white horses and the fourth chariot had grey horses. All the horses were strong.
korean_text: 셋째 병거는 흰 말들이, 넷째 병거는 어룽지고 건장한 말들이 메었는지라

sentences.original_text: The third chariot had white horses
sentences.korean_translation: 세 번째 전차는 흰 말을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and the fourth chariot had grey horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 번째 전차는 회색 말을 가지고 있었습니다
